abstract: A new supercomputer project at the Oak Ridge National Laboratory shows how high-performance computing has been forced to develop more energy-efficient designs.
snippet: A new supercomputer project at the Oak Ridge National Laboratory shows how high-performance computing has been forced to develop more energy-efficient designs.
lead_paragraph: In computing, as in so many fields, the best path to progress is often not a straight line.

headline.main: In Supercomputing, a Turn to Energy-Saving Graphics Chips
